name: Beltane
description:
Police and local people are baffled by phone cam footage that seems to show extraordinary phenomena over the 4000 year old stone circle, in Duloe, Cornwall. Experts are examining the footage, filmed by a local farmer, in the hope that sceptical eyes may reveal what the farmer describes as an "encounter". Is it a drone? Faked? Experimental military craft? Or a power generated by the stones themselves? Play to find out.

Strange and mysterious sightings have been reported at the ancient stone circle at Duloe, Cornwall, in the far South West of Great Britain. The area is steeped in folklore and legend, with human activity dating back millennia, the time of stone age tools and celestial worship. Many believe that stone circles are placed to align with planets, the moon and the movements of the sun. Others believe there is some otherworldly quality, an unknowable power from beneath the soil or perhaps, given recent evidence, from above?

  • Explore the ancient stone circle, while unearthing clues to the nature of the 'mysterious lights'.
  • Examine ancient monoliths in full 3D detail, to unlock their secrets.
  • Full 360 exploration, 4K graphical location detail.
  • Survey the location using a compass and camcorder, to find that which is hidden.
  • Learn about the real location, through immersive learning.
  • Impressive visual effects and augmented scenery, 3d foliage.
  • A full audio experience, with sound captured at the site.
  • A short 'point and click' adventure.

Full Soundtrack comes with the game, an experimental delve into the Cornish Countryside as a heavy atmosphere and thunderous conditions threaten to disturb the rural idyll.

  • 01 - Rural Activity
  • 02 - The Atmosphere
  • 03 - Bad Reception
  • 04 - Inside The Circle
  • 05 - The Compass
  • 06 - Akerite Events
  • 07 - Camcorder
  • 08 - The Message
  • 09 - The Beacon
  • 10 - Abduction
  • 11 - Space
  • 12 - Transmission

System Requirements

Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB nVidia Geforce GT460 or equivalent
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio
